meanings.sent1: The latest movie was very exciting.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: I heard the latest joke and couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: His latest invention revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The latest technology is changing our lives rapidly.

meanings.definition: The most recent news or developments.
meanings.sent1: I read the latest in the newspaper this morning.
meanings.sent2: The latest from the company is quite surprising.
meanings.sent3: Have you heard the latest about the talking parrot?
meanings.sent4: The latest on the weather forecast is not looking good.
meanings.sent5: She always stays updated with the latest in politics.
